short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shows resolved Github pull request comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resolved comments may contain valuable bits of information. But who has the time to open them one by one? This plugins shows all resolved comments automatically.
